page.title: 03Industry
page.content: The Royal Navy is one of the biggest industries in the area,with several training establishments employing many local people. The Amey Roadstone Corporation has turned the local railway sidings from a sleepy backwater into a noisy bustling workplace. Plessey the electronics firm and Schweppes the soft drink firm are two other large businesses in the area,as also is the Office of Population,Census and Surveys. There are many more small local firms and service industries,including a new computer industry. Tom Parker who was a gentleman well known in the town is still remembered by the milk floats which bear his name.The dairy supplies milk,eggs and potatoes to the residents of the town.
